Package utility

Class Lists

java.lang.Object
utility.Lists
public class Lists extends Object
List class that creates and manipulates observable array lists. This class populates observable array lists manually or with result sets from the database. Class also has methods to clear lists or to search the lists.
Author:
JosÃ© L DÃ¡vila Montalvo

    • lookupCustomer

      public static Customer lookupCustomer(int id) throws NumberFormatException, NullPointerException
      Method searches the customer list for a specific customer. Method uses customer id to find the customer.
      Returns:
      Returns the customer if found or null if nothing is found.
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException
      NullPointerException

    • lookupCustomer

      Method searches the customer list for a specific customer. Method uses customer name to find the customer.
      Returns:
      Returns a customer list with any customers found

    • lookupContact

      public static Contact lookupContact(Contact contact) throws NumberFormatException, NullPointerException

      Returns:
      Returns the contact if found or null if nothing is found.
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException
      NullPointerException

    • appointmentResult

      public static void appointmentResult() throws SQLException
      Void method that adds an appointment to the list. Method gets a result set from a query and populates an appointment object with the result set data. The result set for this method contains all appointments.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • appointmentResultMonth

      public static void appointmentResultMonth() throws SQLException

      Throws:
      SQLException

    • ascAppointmentResults

      public static void ascAppointmentResults(int custId) throws SQLException
      Method that adds an appointment to the list. Method gets a result set from a query and populates an appointment object with the result set data. The result set for this method contains appointments associated to a customer.
      Parameters:
      custId - Id of customer
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • appTimeCompResult

      public static void appTimeCompResult(Instant startTime, Instant endTime) throws SQLException
      Method that adds an appointment to the list. Method gets a result set from a query and populates an appointment object with the result set data. The result set for this method contains appointments that overlap.
      Parameters:
      startTime - Start time of an appointment
      endTime - End time of an appointment
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • upcomingAppointment

      public static Appointment upcomingAppointment(Instant instant) throws SQLException
      Method that returns an appointment. Method gets a result set from a query and populates an appointment object with the result set data. The result set for this method contains an upcoming appointment.
      Parameters:
      instant - Start time of an appointment
      Returns:
      Returns an appointment that will begin in 15 minutes of the saved start time.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • numberOfAppointments

      public static Integer numberOfAppointments(String month, String type) throws SQLException
      Method that returns an integer. Method gets a result set from a query and returns a number. The result set for this method contains the number of appointments for the indicated month and type.
      Parameters:
      month - Month the appointment is scheduled for
      type - Type of appointment
      Returns:
      Returns the number of appointments for the month and type
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • customerResult

      public static void customerResult() throws SQLException
      Void method that adds a customer to the list. Method gets a result set from a query and populates a customer object with the result set data. The result set for this method contains all customers.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • numberOfCustomers

      public static Integer numberOfCustomers(int fldID) throws SQLException
      Method that returns an integer. Method gets a result set from a query and returns a number. The result set for this method contains the number of customers for the indicated first-level division.
      Parameters:
      fldID - First-level division the customer resides in.
      Returns:
      Returns the number of customers that reside in the division.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • contactSchedule

      public static void contactSchedule(int contactId) throws SQLException

      Parameters:
      contactId - Id of contact
      Throws:
      SQLException
